title: My account was hacked
body: so my account was hacked today, the hacker purchased 20$ of rp with my money and moved my account to a different region, this is the only thing i have access to in regards to the account besides email, though the password was changed and i don't know what it was changed to. I've tried recovering the account via email but to no success due to the region transfer(i think). my IGN is "Stewps" and i really don't know what to do at this point, I've submitted a support ticket but all i got was an automated response saying the line is long.  i feel as if every passing minute my account gets farther from recovery. if you have any advice or anything like that, all help is appreciated.

replies.body:
Losing access to an account **really sucks!**. I've had it happen once or twice with other games and it always puts a load of stress on the table. I know it can be hard, but if you remain patient, we'll have an account specialist with you on your ticket as soon as possible. 

With some investigation and verification, I'm confident we'll get this sorted out with you. Let me know if you have any questions.
